name: itshardtolovewhatyouunderstand
description:
An odd little game about looking at established ideas in a new light. Lack of time during development made the game even more peculiar than intended. Well, the more, the merrier

All sounds and animations are intentional

made for Siberian Game Jam fall 2021 (theme:  murphy law)

CONTROLS: arrow keys or WASD

GOAL: answer questions
